title: 2021-09-24 - Daily Ruleset Update Summary 2021-09-24
plain_text:
# Daily Ruleset Update Summary 2021/09/24

**[proofpoint.com/us/daily-ruleset-update-summary-20210924](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/daily-ruleset-update-summary-20210924)**

[Daily Ruleset Update Summary](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/daily-ruleset-update-summary)
Daily Ruleset Update Summary 2021/09/24

[***] Summary: [***]

13 new OPEN, 25 new PRO (13 + 12). MirrorBlast, Jupyter Stealer,

PerSwaysion Phishkit.


September 24, 2021


-----

Thanks @ffforward, @pr0xylife, @James_inthe_box, @LNadav, @h2jazi
and @ShadowChasing1

We are hiring!
[https://proofpoint.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/ProofpointCareers/job/Sunnyvalâ€¦](https://proofpoint.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/ProofpointCareers/job/Sunnyvale-CA/Senior-Product-Manager_R6200)

Please share issues, feedback, and requests at
[https://feedback.emergingthreats.net/feedback](https://feedback.emergingthreats.net/feedback)
